text: A megacorporation demands your personal data.

choices.result: You reluctantly surrender your personal data to the megacorporation. Your bank account grows, but your sense of privacy diminishes.
You stand up for your privacy and refuse to give in. The megacorporation backs off, but it comes at a cost to your finances.

text: A cyber-enhancement clinic offers you an upgrade.

choices.result: You opt for cybernetic enhancements, boosting your physical and mental capabilities. However, you begin to feel less human.

choices.text: Decline the offer to maintain your humanity
choices.result: You choose to maintain your humanity and decline the cyber-enhancements. Your dignity remains intact, but you miss out on potential enhancements.

text: You stumble upon an underground hacker's den.

choices.text: Join the hackers and become a cybercriminal
choices.result: You decide to join the hackers and become a cybercriminal. Your mental skills improve, but your dignity takes a hit as you embrace the dark side of the net.

choices.text: Report the den to the authorities
choices.result: You choose to report the den to the authorities. Your dignity remains intact, but you feel like a traitor to the hacker community.

text: A mysterious AI offers you a lucrative hacking job.

choices.result: You accept the AI's job offer, and your bank account swells with credits. Your hacking skills improve, but your sense of morality suffers.

choices.text: Reject the AI's offer to maintain your ethics
choices.result: You decline the AI's offer to maintain your ethical stance. Your dignity remains high, but you miss out on a fortune.

text: A megacorporation recruits you as a corporate spy.

choices.result: You agree to become a corporate spy for the megacorporation. Your mental and financial skills improve, but your sense of dignity takes a nosedive.
You decline the offer, preserving your dignity but forgoing the opportunity for wealth and power.

text: You discover a secret conspiracy involving government and corporations.

choices.text: Expose the conspiracy to the public
choices.result: You expose the conspiracy to the public, becoming a hero of the people and boosting your mental skills and dignity.

choices.text: Stay silent and avoid the danger
choices.result: You decide to stay silent, avoiding danger but living with the guilt of not acting against the conspiracy.
